data.name: Starkeepers
data.detailed_description:
Starkeepers is an action-packed multiplayer online that casts players as Astrals – high dimensional beings capable of space-time magic roaming the multiverse. Venture into mythological epics to take your righteous stand against cosmic threats, or secretly align yourself with different faction powers trying to influence the course of past history. 


Learn combat skills from star relics and morph into different ancient warrior heroes. Personalize them with unique attributes, and equip them with occult weapons crafted from gathered materials, or goodies picked off of bested enemies. 


Actions have consequences. Both individual and group decisions influence how the narrative unfolds every season. A dynamic questing system brings back the element of surprise. Set out on common objectives, discover the hidden roads less traveled, or go rogue and dive into the deep end, you chart your own story epic. 


As a clan, strategize, and custom build your very own Starkeep, then arm it to the teeth. Lay out a labyrinth of bulwarks, mounted guns, turrets, and traps to safeguard your territorial sovereignty. Establish senate halls for voting, treasuries to control taxation, and stables for mount-sharing. 


From settling a scuffle with a duel, to an unforeseen clash on a dungeon run, to an all out brawl in a Starkeep siege, resorting to violence is always an option. Double jumps, omni-directional sprinting, ground rolls, and blocking mechanics, all come as standard. Unleash a well-timed combo, and dispatch your rival with spectacular finishing moves.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Experience an action-packed sandbox MMOARPG and venture into a world of mythological epics ready to unfold. Prove your worth as a Starkeeper, rise against cosmic threats, and restore balance to the Astral Realms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRA with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
